com.parkingtycoon.helpers.interfaces

Interface Showable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HudBuildController, HudBuildView, HudCarsController, HudCarsView, HudDiagramsController, HudSettingsController, HudSettingsView

    public interface Showable
    This Class is responsible for providing a basic interface for items who would like to be showable in the UI. A scenario where you would use this is a pauseButton that opens a window. The window implements Showable and by doing this it also makes the decision if it allows multiple window open at the same time.
    Author:
    Timo Strating

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void hide()
      Hide this item.
      void show(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage stage)
      Show this Item

    • Method Detail

      • show

        void show(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage stage)
        Show this Item
        Parameters:
        stage - the stage where the showed item should be added to

      • hide

        default void hide()
        Hide this item. You can only hide things if you can also show them. There is no hide without a show.
